cloud_sync.settings.dev.client_id.title: Client ID

cloud_sync.settings.auth.log_out.description: Logs you out of Cloud Sync
cloud_sync.settings.auth.delete_data.title: Delete data

cloud_sync.settings.data.import_data.description: Imports data from the Cloud Sync API
cloud_sync.settings.data.export_local_data.title: Export Local Data
cloud_sync.settings.data.import_local_data.title: Import Local Data
cloud_sync.settings.label.auth_needed: Authorize first to manage your data
cloud_sync.sheet.import_data.title: Import Data
cloud_sync.sheet.import_data.already_synced: All addons in the cloud are already imported
cloud_sync.alert.change_theme.title: Theme selected
cloud_sync.alert.change_theme.body: A reload is required to see the selected theme. Do you want to reload now?
cloud_sync.alert.log_out.title: Log out
cloud_sync.alert.log_out.body: Are you sure you want to log out of Cloud Sync?
cloud_sync.alert.delete_data.title: Delete data
cloud_sync.alert.delete_data.body: Are you sure you want to delete your save data? (this cannot be undone!)
cloud_sync.alert.save_data.title: Save data
cloud_sync.alert.save_data.body: Are you sure you want to overwrite your save data? (this cannot be undone!)
cloud_sync.alert.encryption_key.title: Enter encryption key
cloud_sync.alert.encryption_key.required: An encryption key must be set.
cloud_sync.alert.decryption_key.title: Enter decryption key
cloud_sync.alert.decryption_key.required: A decryption key must be set.
cloud_sync.alert.unproxied_plugin_warn.title: Warning
cloud_sync.alert.unproxied_plugin_warn.body: Installing unproxied plugins can be dangerous since they haven't been verified by Vendetta staff. Are you sure you want to import them?
cloud_sync.alert.plugin_settings_revert.title: Revert Settings
cloud_sync.alert.plugin_settings_revert.body: Are you sure you want to revert all plugin settings?
cloud_sync.log.import.result.success: Finished! Imported $plugins and $themes. All imports were successful.
cloud_sync.log.import.result.fail: Finished! Imported $plugins and $themes. Failed to import $failed_plugins and $failed_themes.

plugin_browser.sheet.sort.date_newest: Date de création (du plus récent au plus vieux)
plugin_browser.sheet.sort.date_oldest: Date de création (du plus vieux au plus récent)
